name: bknd
description: BKND is a developer-focused backend-as-a-service platform for building and deploying APIs, authentication, storage, and event-driven automation. It offers a web UI and self-hosting option for building modern apps.
features: Backend-as-a-Service: Complete backend infrastructure for modern applications. Build faster.
API Builder: Create and deploy REST APIs without complex setup. Rapid development.
Authentication: Built-in user management and auth flows. Secure by default.
File Storage: Integrated storage solution for uploads and media. Simplified file handling.
Event-Driven: Automation and workflows triggered by events. Reactive architecture.
Web Dashboard: Manage your backend through intuitive web interface. Visual control.
Self-Hosting: Deploy on your own infrastructure for full control. Data sovereignty.
Developer-Focused: Tools and APIs designed for developer productivity. Built for devs.
